ygData.subject: Prices in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Guess I reacted a little strongly too ... just get really annoyed with the way some people act in EQ.  Nothing wrong with bartering or haggling but some people
ygData.messageBody:
Guess I reacted a little strongly too ... just get really annoyed with
the way some people act in EQ. Nothing wrong with bartering or
haggling but some people get obnoxious with it.

I know: It's their game too. I concede that I don't have a right to
condemn them. But I will and you can't stop me!

Just out of interest ... anyone ever tried to work out how much
copper, silver and gold a monk would drop in getting to lvl 50?


Sparx Dreamreaver
Level 36 (finally), Karana
- Resists'R'Us -
